rows.label: qev051303_MSG0001
rows.name:
So you are [ST:playername ].
I have heard tales of your dealings with my kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051303_MSG0002
rows.name:
It is precisely because of your reputation for strength
that I would ask you to meet with my master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051303_MSG0003
rows.name: It concerns a business proposal of a discreet nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051303_MSG0004
rows.name:
I ask that you come to the industrial district by night.
I trust you understand the need for privacy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051303_MSG0005
rows.name:
It's quite the lucrative offerâ€”I assure you it will be well
worth your time.[ST:wait ]
